message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. This is a great deal, as you know it's worth a lot more to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $13,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our potential deal, $13,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $14,000.  This is a fair price considering the value to you. Let's close this deal!
